text: December 16th
(Lunar Residence 14)
Welcome back!
speaker: protag_happy

text: Hey, how did the job interview go?
speaker: protag_happy

text: I dunno. It's so weird because you don't know if they like you or not.
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: That's fair. Here's hoping though!
speaker: protag_happy

text: Hey, Wren?
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: What is it?
speaker: protag_neutral

text: Thanks again for letting me stay here for a while. I think I've really been able to pull myself together.
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: What do you mean?
speaker: protag_neutral

text: Before, all I knew in life was being a warrior.
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: It was the only thing I understood as good or important. I couldn't listen to myself because I didn't know how.
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: But after I came here, I was away from that world. I had the space to stop and think about what I wanted.
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: It's not always easy, but I think I'm starting to discover and know myself better.
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: I'm grateful for that.
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: Awww, well you make it easy. You're a very tidy guest!
speaker: protag_happy

text: You know, hearing you say all that just now...
speaker: protag_annoyed

text: ...it's helped me understand life a little better too.
speaker: protag_neutral

text: I'm glad.
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: << FIN >>
